field.label: Name
field.help: Name to identify this condition.

field.label: Description
field.help: Description for this condition.

field.label: Negate condition
field.help: Use this to invert the meaning of the expression.

field.label: Host Prefix
field.help: HTTP host header starts with string (prefix match)

field.label: Host Suffix
field.help: HTTP host header ends with string (suffix match)

field.label: Host String
field.help: HTTP host header matches exact string

field.label: Host Regex
field.help: HTTP host header matches regular expression

field.label: Host Contains
field.help: HTTP host header contains string (substring match)

field.label: Path Prefix
field.help: HTTP request URL path starts with string (prefix match)

field.label: Path Suffix
field.help: HTTP request URL path ends with string (suffix match)

field.label: Path Matches
field.help: HTTP request URL path matches exact string

field.label: Path Regex
field.help: HTTP request URL path matches regular expression

field.label: Subdir matches
field.help: HTTP request URL path contains directory (subdir match)

field.label: Path Contains
field.help: HTTP request URL path contains string (substring match)

field.label: URL Parameter
field.help: Specify the URL parameter to be checked for the value specified below.

field.label: Parameter Value
field.help: Specify the value for the URL parameter.

field.label: SSL Error ID
field.help: Specify the SSL/TLS error ID that should be checked for the incoming connection. Please refer to your SSL library's documentation for an exhaustive list of error codes.

field.label: CA Common-Name
field.help: Verify the CA Common-Name of the certificate presented by the client against the specified string.

field.label: Source IP
field.help: Verify the source IPv4 address of the client of the session matches the specified IPv4 or IPv6 address.

field.label: Usable Servers
field.help: Verify the minimum number of usable servers in the named backend matches the specified value.

field.label: Backend
field.help: Use the specified backend to count usable servers. Leave empty to use the current backend.

field.label: SNI Matches
field.help: The value of the Server Name TLS extension sent by a client matches the exact string.

field.label: SNI Contains
field.help: The value of the Server Name TLS extension sent by a client contains the specified string (substring match).

field.label: SNI Prefix
field.help: The value of the Server Name TLS extension sent by a client starts with the specified string (prefix match).

field.label: SNI Suffix
field.help: The value of the Server Name TLS extension sent by a client ends with the specified string (suffix match).

field.label: Option pass-through
field.help: Specify a HAProxy condition/ACL that is currently not supported by the GUI.
